plugins.name: autosizetext
plugins.description:
When triggered this plugin autosizes text to fit within its textbox. If text it too small it will grow to fit the bounds or if text it too big it will shrink to fit the bounds.


This plugin has three different options to select textboxes to resize.


Full Page- Resizes all textboxes on current page

Selection - Resizes currently selected textboxes

Textbox Names - comma seperated list of textbox names to resize (ex. textbox1,textbox2 with resize textboxes that have names textbox1 and textbox2)


Visit github for more information on how to use the plugin, how to report issues, and how to suggest further improvements.

plugins.name: Nucleus Design Component Library
plugins.description:
Imagine a tool designed to amplify your creativity, extend your design capabilities, and give you the building blocks to create anything your project needs. That’s the idea behind this Figma plugin: a growing collection of over 1,000 templates (and counting)—from web layouts to mobile screens, components, and icons—that are as functional as they are inspiring.


We believe design should feel effortless and empowering. Whether you’re building something simple or tackling a complex project, this plugin provides templates that adapt to your vision and help you skip the repetitive work so you can focus on crafting something beautiful and meaningful.


What’s Inside:

  1. 1000+ Design components: Mobile, Web, Icons, and much more
  2. Auto Layout Ready: Flexible components that fit your needs perfectly.
  3. 4pt Grid System: Built for precision and clarity.
  4. Organized Layers: Every element is cleanly structured for an intuitive workflow.
  5. Copy & Paste Simplicity: Quickly bring ideas to life by dropping templates directly into your workspace.


A Living Library

This isn’t just a static collection—it’s a resource that grows with you. With continuous updates, your library expands regularly, giving you new tools to push your designs even further.


At its core, this plugin is more than just a design tool. It’s a resource to help you elevate your craft, empowering you to create faster, smarter, and with greater inspiration.
plugins.tagline: Your design arsenal, expanded.

plugins.name: Prototype Quick Link
plugins.description:
This is a plugin that provides an easy way to copy a Prototype link to specific frames to the clipboard without having to switch to the Presentation mode.


How To Use

Select layers and run the 'Copy prototype link' command, and the link will be copied to the clipboard. You can also select and copy links to multiple selected Frames. In this case, each link will start with the name of its Frame.


Demo Video

link to the file (gif)


First Setup

The plugin must know the File Key to be able to create a prototype link. But this Key is private and it is only accessible to plugins published internally to a company that is on an Organization plan. So to make the plugin work you need to insert this File Key manually on first start of the plugin.


Set the File Key

  1. Click the 'Share' button on the top panel and click the 'Copy link'. Or you also can copy the whole File URL from the browser's address bar. The File URL looks like: https://figma.com/file/e9z7p5lisUPmRe9z7p5lisUPm/FileName
  2. Go to: Plugins -> Prototype Quick Link -> Settings
  3. Paste the copied URL to the input field and the plugin will extract the File Key automatically. You also can paste only the File Key to the input field.
  4. Done! Click 'Save' and use the plugin


Info: Your file share link is not sent to any external server.


Support

Plugin creation fueled by coffee — buy me a cuppa.

accepted.name: Max Martynov
accepted.description: Web & Mobile Developer (JavaScript / Vue / Flutter / Ionic / Node)

plugins.tagline: Copy a Prototype link without switching to the Presentation mode

plugins.name: Procreate Import
plugins.description:
Import your .procreate files into Figma, complete with named layers, groups, blend modes, and clipping masks.


Supported:

  • Clipping masks
  • Background color
  • sRGB color space
  • Blend modes
  • File and layer names
  • Import size options
  • Procreate groups
  • Import of all layers (or option to flatten on import)


Not supported (yet):

  • Text layers (rasterize in Procreate to import)
  • GIF import
  • P3 color space (results will vary)

plugins.name: Japanese Dummy Text
plugins.description:
日本語のダミーテキストを生成します。


ダミーテキストを生成したいテキストレイヤーをすべて選択し「生成」をクリックすると、レイヤーごとにダミーテキストを生成します。Min/Max のどちらかのみを入力すると、正確な文字 (文) 数を生成します。Min/Max に異なる数値を入力すると、その範囲内の文字 (文) 数を生成します。


「自動生成」は、選択したレイヤーのテキストボックスに最適な量のダミーテキストで自動的に生成します。


----


Generate Japanese dummy text to fill your text layers.


Select all the text layers you want to generate dummy text for then click "Generate" — it will generate for each layer uniquely. If you only input a number to either Min or Max, it will generate the exact number of characters or sentences. If you input different numbers to Min/Max, it will generate the number of characters or sentences in that range.


"Auto-generate" will automatically fill the selected layers with the perfectly amount of dummy text to fit the text box.

plugins.name: Image injector
plugins.description:
Batch fill layers with JPGs, PNGs or WEBPs from a folder.


How it works

  1. Open the plugin.
  2. Select the layers you want to fill.
  3. Select the image folder.
  4. Inject images.


Applicable layer types include

  1. Components / instances
  2. Frames
  3. Shapes
  4. Vectors


Customisable settings

  • Insert images into layers in the order of their names, their layer order, their position or randomly.
  • Insert image files according to their file names, or in a random sequence.
  • Include images found in the subfolders of the chosen folder.
  • Resize layers according to the relative image width or height so that images are not cropped.
  • Loop through images until all layers are filled, or only fill as many layers as there are images.
  • Insert images above or below all other fills, or remove all existing fills.


More in the future...
plugins.tagline: Batch fill layers with JPGs, PNGs or WEBPs from a folder

plugins.name: Guides inspector
plugins.description:
The Guides inspector is complete control over the guides!

✅ You can:
- Create / Delete guides.
- Copy / Paste guides of the frame.
- Generate grids from guides.
- Create guide templates for later use.
- Adjust the position of the guides with high accuracy.

⚠ Changes on the canvas are sometimes displayed only after you hover over it. This bug should be fixed soon.

About the Create Guides window:
⚠ To get into it, you need to click on the name of the frame.

1. The Margin parameter is specified in the following order: margin-top, margin-right, margin-bottom, margin-left.

2. Some parameters support the "auto" value. 

It can be used, for example, to center the columns by setting the margin-left and margin-right parameters to "auto".
If you specify it only for margin-left, and margin-right set to 0, then the columns will be pressed to the right edge.

⚠ When applying the template, - if its parameters are not suitable for the selected frame, - they will be adjusted.

For example, if the template contains 10 columns with a width of 100px, and the frame has a width of only 500px, then the number of columns will be reduced to 5.

___
A demo video with an example of usage can be found here: producthunt.com/posts/guides-inspector-figma-plugin

accepted.name: Andreslav Kozlov
accepted.description: Digital designer. I love the design, the code and the cock crow in the morning :) Freelancer.

plugins.name: Nested Corners
plugins.description:
Apply the perfect corner radius to nested layers based on the parent corner radius and padding.


👉 Usage

  1. Set the corner radius of the parent frame.
  2. Make sure the parent frame has auto layout enabled and its padding is uniform.
  3. Select the child layer and run the plugin.


✅ Supported

  • Apply to multiple selections at once
  • Frames with mixed corner radii
  • Corner smoothing


❌ Not Supported

  • Frames with mixed padding
  • Layer types other than RECTANGLE, FRAME, and COMPONENT
  • Changing the parent corner radius based on child corner radius

  • Frames with mixed padding

plugins.name: Variables ⇔ CSV (Export+Import)
plugins.description:
Highlights


  1. Export text strings to CSV for bulk editing
  2. Export text strings to CSV and share with developers/translators/copy writers/reviewers
  3. Import edited CSV back to Figma to update variables
  4. Multi-lingual support built-in
  5. Simple CSV format


Supports only string variables





Non English variable values

The CSV from the plugin is encoded with UTF-8 encoding, which can handle most languages written in Unicode.


Some programs, particularly MS Excel, might not open/save the CSV properly when opened normally/directly. Follow below steps if you face issues.


Opening the CSV

  1. For MS Excel: Open a new excel file > Click Data > Get External Data > From text > Select the CSV file > Set file origin to UTF-8 in the wizard.
  2. For other programs, follow similar methods to set the file encoding to UTF-8 before opening the CSV.


Saving the CSV after editing

  1. For MS Excel: File > Save as > Change file format in the dropdown to "CSV UTF-8 (Comma delimited) (.csv)" > Save
  2. For other programs, follow similar methods to set the file encoding to UTF-8 before saving the edited CSV.

accepted.name: Vivek G
accepted.description: Product designer, half developer and everything tech in between!

plugins.tagline: Manage Figma variables on CSV with export/import options. Multi-lingual support built-in.

plugins.name: User Data generator (Name, Age, Profession, Location...)
plugins.description:
The ultimate Figma plugin for designers and developers who need realistic user data at their fingertips. With just a few clicks, generate customizable datasets including names, ages, professions, and locations. Perfect for populating prototypes, testing layouts, and creating compelling user personas. Say goodbye to lorem ipsum and hello to data that brings your designs to life!


Customizable Data Generation: Users can specify the number of records and select which fields to include (name, age, sex, profession, location).

Random Name Generation: The plugin generates realistic full names by combining random first and last names from predefined lists.

Age Range Generation: Generates random ages between 18 and 77.

Gender Assignment: Randomly assigns 'Male' or 'Female' for the sex field.

Profession Selection: Chooses from a diverse list of professions.

Location Assignment: Assigns random city names from a predefined list of major cities.

Table Creation: Automatically creates a formatted table in Figma with the generated data.

Text Layer Export: Ability to export generated data to an existing text layer if selected.

Error Handling: Robust error checking and reporting for various scenarios.

User Interface: A clean UI for inputting generation parameters and displaying results.

Figma Integration: Seamlessly integrates with Figma's viewport and selection features.
plugins.tagline: Realistic User Data in Seconds

plugins.name: Figma to React Bootstrap
plugins.description:
Website:

https://figma-to-react-bootstrap.vercel.app/

How to use this plugin?:

How to use: Figma to React Bootstrap Plugin


Figma to React Bootstrap

This cool plugin takes your figma designs that uses the Figma components from Figma to React Bootstrap file and turns them into ready-to-use React-Bootstrap components. It's like having a design wizard by your side, so you can spend more time building your layouts. The preview mode offers an awesome user experiences that shows in real time the rendered react component.


Figma to React Bootstrap Figma Component library

This component file library has been especially made to follow the React Bootstrap components API to match it's component's props, making it easier to use out of the box instances to use in your designs.


ProTip!: As long as your layers are named after React Bootstrap components and follow the same nested components structure, then the plugin will render the React Bootstrap component


﻿Supported components:

  1. ✅ Grid
  2. ❌Forms
  3. ✅ Accordion
  4. ✅ Alerts
  5. ✅ Badge
  6. ✅ Breadcrumb
  7. ✅ Button group
  8. ✅ Buttons
  9. ✅ Card
  10. ✅ Carousels
  11. ✅ Close button
  12. ✅ Dropdowns
  13. ✅ Figures
  14. ❌ Images
  15. ✅ Figures
  16. ✅ List groups
  17. ✅ Modal
  18. ✅ Navbars
  19. ✅ Navs and tabs
  20. ❌ Offcanvas
  21. ❌ Overlay
  22. ✅ Pagination
  23. ❌ Placeholders
  24. ❌ Progress bars (in progress)
  25. ✅ Spinners
  26. ✅ Tables
  27. ❌ Tabs
  28. ✅ Toast (and Toast container)


*This plugin does not export your custom styles yet

* This plugin is meant to render default styled React Bootstrap components.

* Maybe in the future I will implement custom styling export.


If you want to support my work in other ways:

  1. ☕️ Buy me a coffee


Thank you!

accepted.name: Eugenio Ciccale
accepted.description:
I'm a Product Designer & Front-end developer creating Figma Plugins to enhance your creative workflows

https://shop.plusuidesign.com/

plugins.tagline: Convert Bootstrap 5 designs to React-Bootstrap components effortlessly. Design-to-code in 1 click!

plugins.name: Style to JSON
plugins.description:
Export Style as JSON File. Run Once and File Download Automatically.

Feel free to comment your feedback!


Easy-to-use HEX and rgba() format

All color style will be convert into convenient Hex, Hex8 and rgba() format, so it's easier for developers to use in CSS file.


Linear Gradient Styles Supported

For gradient styles, linear-gradient styles are supported, and they will be convert into CSS syntax format like: "linear-gradient(180deg, #ffffff 0%, #ff0000 100%)"


Effect Styles Supported

Effect Styles are included as well, and they will be convert to easy-to-use css properties like: "1px 3px 2px 0px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) inset"


Multi-layer Styles are not supported.

The plugin will extract all style layers into a sub-level json.


Image & Video Styles are not supported.

The plugin will ignore all image and video styles since that's non-sence for a style sheet.
plugins.tagline: Run once, download style json automatically

plugins.name: Select The Same Instance
plugins.description:
Allows you to select only instances with a specific variant from within a selection such as a group or frame. This can be used, for example, to select only those buttons in the selection that have a Size of Big and a Shape of Round.


How To Use

  1. Select the group or frame that contains the instance you want to select.
  2. Activate this plug-in.
  3. Choose the Component Set name.
  4. Select all the values of the variant you want to select.
  5. Press the Select button.


Is it difficult to understand? Please refer to the video.

Save Time and Money


Say goodbye to expensive, underwhelming design resources. Figmate provides comprehensive, high-quality assets that get the job done right.


A Versatile Tool for All Projects


Whether it's a website, app, or presentation, Figmate has the perfect assets, built on a powerful design system, to suit your needs.


Never Start from Scratch


Streamline your workflow. Figmate is your one-stop solution for consistent, cohesive designs across teams and projects.


Always Stay Ahead

A lightweight plugin for Figma that spaces elements evenly by exact pixel measurements.

Converts any selected object into a webP file.

This plugin is specifically meant to be used for android development. 

The objects are saved into the default android resource folders:
1x - drawable-mdpi
1.5x - drawable-hdpi
2x - drawable-xhdpi
3x - drawable-xxhdpi
4x - drawable-xxxhdpi

Check out the source code here:
https://github.com/ServePeak/Figma-Android-WebP-Generator

plugins.name: JavaScript and JSX Serializer
plugins.description: With plugins and widgets it's possible to build powerful Figma tools, but it's still easier to build the components you need in Figma itself. This tool serializes Figma nodes to JavaScript, TypeScript, and JSX that can be copied and pasted into your plugin or widget code. It's basically what should show up in the code dropdown under the inspect tab.

plugins.name: Frame History
plugins.description:
The fastest way to archive your work and look back at previous iterations. No more manual hassle - get rid of the copy/paste and duplicate pages process. 


✅ Save copies of frames you're working on, in a single click.

✅ Explore a visual chronological timeline of your saved frames.

✅ Navigate faster with a time saving version preview.

✅ Easily search and browse through saved frames.


⚙️ How it works

Select the frame you want to save and click the Save button. Frame History will send a copy of the frame to a page called “Frame History” that keeps a visual chronological timeline of your saved versions.


Every time you save a version, Frame History will automatically add a version preview to the plugin’s UI. Version previews are only visible to the creator, and are easy to find using the search feature.


⭐ Help us improve

Feedback and questions are welcome: colorocket.contact@gmail.com


🚀 Roadmap

Frame History is currently in beta. We are planning to add more cool features to make it even better! 


User requests:

  • Detach all instances when saving
  • Save multiple frames at once
  • Resize plugin window

plugins.name: Export Kit
plugins.description:
Export Kit is a Figma plugin focused on enhancing design workflow efficiency. It allows you to easily create and manage multiple export presets, enabling one-click export of design assets in various specifications.


🎯 Preset Management

- Create multiple custom preset configurations

- Built-in iOS and Android presets

- Visual preset editing interface

- Support for preset renaming and deletion


🚀 Batch Export

- One-click export in multiple sizes and formats

- Support for PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF formats

- Flexible file naming and folder organization


💎 Image Optimization

- Smart PNG compression

- Automatic file name conflict prevention

- Automatic ZIP packaging for exported files


📦 Getting Started

1. Install Export Kit from the Figma Community

2. Select the layers you want to export

3. Choose or create an export preset

4. Click the export button to complete


📝 Acknowledgments

- PNG compression powered by https://github.com/photopea/UPNG.js - thanks for their great work

- Delete icon designed by [frelayasia](https://www.flaticon.com/authors/frelayasia) from https://www.flaticon.com/



Export Kit 是一个专注于提升设计工作流效率的 Figma 插件。它让你可以轻松创建和管理多个导出预设，一键导出多种规格的设计资源。



🎯 预设管理

- 支持创建多个自定义预设配置

- 内置 iOS 和 Android 常用预设

- 可视化预设编辑界面

- 支持预设的重命名和删除


🚀 批量导出

- 一键导出多种尺寸和格式

- 支持 PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF 格式

- 灵活的文件命名和文件夹组织


💎 图像优化

- PNG 智能压缩

- 自动避免文件名冲突

- 导出文件自动打包为 ZIP


📦 开始使用

1. 在 Figma 社区安装 Export Kit

2. 选择需要导出的图层

3. 选择或创建导出预设

4. 点击导出按钮完成导出



📝 致谢

- PNG压缩功能来自https://github.com/photopea/UPNG.js，感谢他们的伟大工作

- 删除图标由 [frelayasia](https://www.flaticon.com/authors/frelayasia) 设计，来自https://www.flaticon.com/
plugins.tagline: One Click, Export All.Export Images by preset,Free To Compress PNG,Support for PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF

plugins.name: Image Stroke
plugins.description:
直接在 Figma 中为位图添加矢量描边。


  1. 只专注于生成图像的轮廓描边，不处理图像内部细节；
  2. 开箱即用，一切都在 Figma 内部完成；
  3. 中文英文语言切换；
  4. 符合 Figma 的浅色和深色主题模式；
  5. 免费 开源；


---


Add Vector Strokes to Bitmaps Directly in Figma


  1. Focuses solely on generating the outline stroke of the image, without processing internal details；
  2. Ready to use out of the box，everything is done within Figma；
  3. Supports both Chinese and English language switching；
  4. Compatible with Figma's light and dark theme modes；
  5. Free Open Source；
plugins.tagline: Add vector stroke to bitmaps in Figma

plugins.name: Neurons AI
plugins.description:
Your visual assets will never lose the spotlight again!


Neurons AI is our tool that predicts customer responses with +95% accuracy. Get validated heat maps and cognitive scores in an instant to draw attention to your creative content.


Read more about Neurons AI here

 

👑 Features

✅ Attention heat maps

✅ Focus maps

✅ Cognitive and focus scores

✅ Areas of Interest (any shape)

✅ Clarity Score & Maps (Beta)

✅ Engagement Score & Maps (Beta)



💡 How It Works?

 

Neurons AI plugin works as simple as that:

1. Select a Figma Frame

2. Run the Neurons AI engine on your designs

4. View the results in the plugin dialog

5. Copy the selected result in your Frame or link directly into Neurons platform *

 

* Steps 5 is optional

 

🔑 Where can I find my API key?

 

If you are a Neurons customer, reach out to your Customer Success representative. 


If you are not a Neurons customer, book a demo with our sales team here. 

 

 

🤖 About Neurons

Neurons is the world’s leading consumer neuroscience company. Since 2013, we have worked with Fortune-500 companies to optimize every part of their customer journey, including advertising, retail, user experience, innovation, tech, and beyond.


We offer a suite of neuroscience products that comprise Neurons AI, a cloud-based, attention prediction AI; Explore, a remote neuroscience user testing platform; and Research, a bespoke, full-scale research solution.


Read more about Neurons here

accepted.description: Neurons is the world’s leading consumer neuroscience company; We provide you with all the tools to Know what your customers, think, see and feel.

plugins.name: Write Better - AI Text Editor
plugins.description:
Write Better is an AI writing assistant powered by Gemini-Pro. This plugin was developed to assist you in improving your writing by performing various writing actions. It offers flexibility as you can choose to paste your answers directly into the text box or paste them outside your content for review and additional modifications.


The Write Better plugin offers the following features:

✅ Enhancing text writing

✅ Correcting grammar and spelling errors

✅ Adjusting text length (shortening or lengthening)

✅ Adapting writing tone (formal or informal)


Here's how you can use the plugin:

1. Run the plugin

2. Select a text

3. Choose the desired action from the dropdown menu.

4. Click the "Rewrite text" button.


If you require any assistance or have feedback, please feel free to send us an email at onyedikachiibejih@gmail.com or leave a comment below. We'll be delighted to assist you.
plugins.tagline: Write Better allows you to enhance and modify text within your Figma designs.
